body_html: @martinwicke I can send a PR that changes this to is_floating. The reason I added is_real is because future work may go a step further and use float32 backprop + quantized activation, which makes sense mathematically since both represent real-valued number
body_text: @martinwicke I can send a PR that changes this to is_floating. The reason I added is_real is because future work may go a step further and use float32 backprop + quantized activation, which makes sense mathematically since both represent real-valued number
body: @martinwicke I can send a PR that changes this to `is_floating`. The reason I added `is_real` is because future work may go a step further and use float32 backprop + quantized activation, which makes sense mathematically since both represent real-valued number
